snippet: Kurt Mix, an engineer, was the first of four current or former BP employees charged criminally for actions related to the well blowout to be tried and convicted.
abstract: Kurt Mix, former engineer at BP, is found guilty of obstruction of justice for deleting messages during federal probe into how much oil leaked after Gulf of Mexico rig explosion; he is first of four current or former BP employees charged criminally for actions related to well blowout to be tried and convicted.
lead_paragraph: Kurt Mix, an engineer, was the first of four current or former BP employees charged criminally for actions related to the well blowout to be tried and convicted.

headline.main: Ex-BP Worker Is Found Guilty of Obstruction in Gulf Spill
headline.print_headline: Former BP Worker Is Found Guilty of Obstruction in Gulf Spill Case
